mapper.select: SELECT MDOM.COMPANY_CD , MDOM.DIVISION_CD , MDOM.DO_NO , MDOD.DELIVERY_ORDER_ID , MDOD.REFERENCE_NO , MDOD.REFERENCE_DTL_NO , TO_CHAR(MDOD.SHIP_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SHIP_DATE , MDOD.ITEM_ID , MI.ITEM_NM , MI.ITEM_SPEC , MI.ITEM_TYPE , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MI.COMPANY_CD, MI.DIVISION_CD, 'MD0002', MI.ITEM_TYPE, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL) AS ITEM_TYPE_NM , MDOD.QTY , MDOD.UNIT , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_UNIT_NAME(MDOD.COMPANY_CD, MDOD.DIVISION_CD, MDOD.UNIT) FROM DUAL) AS UNIT_NM , '' AS CONVERSION_QTY , '' AS CONVERSION_UNIT , MDOD.CURRENCY_CD , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MDOD.COMPANY_CD, MDOD.DIVISION_CD, 'SM0017', MDOD.CURRENCY_CD, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL) AS CURRENCY_NM , MDOD.EXCHANGE_RATE , MDOD.UNIT_PRICE , MDOD.AMOUNT , MDOD.LOCAL_AMOUNT , MDOM.TAX_TYPE , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MDOM.COMPANY_CD, MDOM.DIVISION_CD, 'SM0029', MDOM.TAX_TYPE, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL) AS TAX_TYPE_NM , TRUNC(ROUND(MDOD.LOCAL_AMOUNT * (MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_TAX_RATE(MDOM.COMPANY_CD , MDOM.DIVISION_CD , MDOM.TAX_TYPE)) ,0),-1) AS TAX_AMOUNT FROM MOM_DELIVERY_ORDER_DTL MDOD , MOM_DELIVERY_ORDER_MST MDOM , MOM_ITEM MI , MOM_TAX_INVOICE_DTL MTID WHERE MDOD.COMPANY_CD = MDOM.COMPANY_CD AND MDOD.DIVISION_CD = MDOM.DIVISION_CD AND MDOD.DO_NO = MDOM.DO_NO AND MDOD.COMPANY_CD = MI.COMPANY_CD AND MDOD.DIVISION_CD = MI.DIVISION_CD AND MDOD.ITEM_ID = MI.ITEM_ID AND MDOD.COMPANY_CD = MTID.COMPANY_CD(+) AND MDOD.DIVISION_CD = MTID.DIVISION_CD(+) AND MDOD.DELIVERY_ORDER_ID = MTID.REFERENCE_DTL_NO AND MDOD.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MDOD.DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MDOM.PARTNER_CD = #{partnerCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MDOD.SHIP_DATE < #{invoiceDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR MDOD.SHIP_DATE = #{invoiceDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND MDOM.TAX_TYPE = #{taxType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MDOD.CLOSING_YN = 'N' AND MTID.REFERENCE_DTL_NO IS NULL;
